SELECT al.document_id, al.approval_no, al.status, al.approved_at AS approvalAt, al.reason, drafter.emp_num AS drafterId, drafter.name AS drafterName, posD.title AS drafterPosition, approver.emp_num AS approverId, approver.name AS approverName, posA.title AS approverPosition, dept.name AS departmentName FROM groupware.approval_line al JOIN groupware.employees drafter ON al.drafter_id = drafter.emp_num JOIN groupware.positions posD ON drafter.pos_id = posD.id JOIN groupware.employees approver ON al.approver_id = approver.emp_num JOIN groupware.positions posA ON approver.pos_id = posA.id JOIN groupware.departments dept ON drafter.dep_id = dept.id WHERE al.document_id = #{id} ORDER BY al.approval_no ASC;
